about_the_game:
Push³ is a modern reimagining of the classic Sokoban puzzle genre, brought to life in a vibrant 3D world. Guide your character through increasingly challenging levels, pushing blocks to their designated spots while navigating intricate obstacles and strategic puzzles.

With intuitive controls, relaxing music, and a minimalist aesthetic, Push³ offers a delightful balance of brain-teasing challenges and satisfying solutions. Whether you’re a Sokoban veteran or new to the genre, Push³ provides hours of rewarding gameplay.

Key Features:

  • Over 50 Levels: From beginner-friendly stages to mind-bending puzzles that will test even the most experienced players.

  • Dynamic 3D Environments: Immerse yourself in beautifully designed worlds with vibrant colors and charming details.

  • Accessible Yet Deep Gameplay: Simple mechanics that anyone can pick up, with puzzles that grow in complexity and depth.

  • Relaxing Atmosphere: Enjoy soothing background music and an uncluttered interface for a stress-free experience.

Can you master every puzzle and uncover the secrets of Push³? Dive in and start pushing your way to victory!

name: Push³

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD Graphics, AMD Vega, etc.)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Solve challenging puzzles in this vibrant 3D reimagining of the classic Sokoban game. Push blocks, navigate intricate obstacles, and master over 50 levels in Push³!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
